about_the_game:
Welcome to Money Maker, the ultimate clicker game where your financial prowess knows no bounds! Immerse yourself in a thrilling journey of wealth accumulation as you click your way to financial success. Here's a glimpse of the exciting features awaiting you in this addictive clicker experience:

Click to Prosper:

Begin your journey by simply clicking to earn money. Every click brings you closer to building your financial empire. Feel the rush as your wealth grows with each satisfying tap!

Upgrade Tree:

Strategize and enhance your money-making abilities with the elaborate Upgrade Tree. Invest your hard-earned Research Points wisely to unlock and upgrade various income streams. Customize your path to riches and watch your earnings skyrocket.

Level System:

Progress through a dynamic level system that rewards your dedication and skill. As you climb the ranks, each level presents a new opportunity to expand your financial reach and dominate the global economy.

Loot Boxes:

Excitement awaits as you open enticing Loot Boxes filled with exclusive bonuses.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Steam OS 2.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K, AMD FX-8350 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Nvidia 680MX or better, 2GB AMD R9 270X or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Money Maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a journey to build the greatest empire ever known by simply clicking your mouse. Your goal is to amass as much wealth as possible, and you'll do so by starting small and gradually expanding your empire one click at a time.
